participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Alex values character and experiences over superficial appearances.
participant_1.background: I just finished helping my student pick out an outfit for a school event. I'm more concerned with my character than my appearance. My college courses are on philosophy and history. I play in an NFL fantasy football league. The most valued possession I have is my collection of rocks because they remind me of the places I've been and the people I've met.

participant_2.name: Jessica Lee
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and caring, Jessica is passionate about education and enjoys creative outlets.
participant_2.background: I'm going to spend time with my family and friends. I just graduated college with my bachelor's degree in education. I'm a teacher who cares about my students' success. I draw comics. I like to dance with my friends.

content.text: Oh not much, just got back from my first day of teaching! How about you?
I just finished helping my student pick out an outfit for a school event. I'm a teacher too!
Oh nice! What grade do you teach?
I teach middle school philosophy and history. What about you?
I just graduated college with my bachelor's degree in education, so I'm still figuring that out. I guess I'll be teaching elementary school.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll do great.
I draw comics and like to dance with my friends.
That's cool! I'm more concerned with my character than my appearance. I'm also in a fantasy football league.
Oh that's awesome! I've never been into fantasy football, but I'm sure it's fun.
It can be. What's your favorite possession?
My collection of rocks. They remind me of the places I've been and the people I've met.
That's a really neat idea. I like it
